Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form

Hello, 
I need to get invoices for my spending.
Where can I generate them?

Hi there! You can generate your invoices directly from your NewsBreak advertiser account. If you need detailed instructions on how to do this, please let me know and I can guide you through the process.

No problem! To generate invoices for your spending, please follow these steps:
1. Log in to your NewsBreak advertiser account.
2. Navigate to the 'Billing' section in the Ad Manager.
3. Here, you should see an option to view and download your invoices.
If you need more detailed instructions or encounter any issues, feel free to ask!
There is just a payment history for each trasaction

I see. If you only see the payment history for each transaction and not the invoices, it might be best to contact our support team for further assistance. Please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with your account details and request for invoice generation. They will be able to help you out with this.

I understand. It seems like you need a more detailed invoice than what's available in the payment history. In this case, I recommend reaching out to our support team for assistance. Please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with your request, and they will be able to provide you with the necessary invoices for your spending.

Understood. For monthly invoices, please email our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com with your account details and specify that you need monthly invoices for your spending. They will assist you in generating and providing the necessary invoices.
Typically, our support team responds within 2-3 business days. If you email adsupport@newsbreak.com with your request for monthly invoices, they should get back to you within that timeframe.
